text:

Iâ€™m fortunate to be supervised by Professor David Hogg, Dr Duygu Sarikaya, Dr Jonathan Darling and Professor Vania Dimitrova.

My background is in Computing, and Iâ€™ve previously worked on research projects at the intersection of AI and healthcare.

title: About
text: My research interests span generative AI, human-computer interaction, and AI-enhanced learning.
